item.description:
The 2nd Glass, Boston new wine publication, and pho republique have partnered to bring you "Silk Road Social" an evening of Wine and Sake sampling with Tasty bites. Come and wet your whistle with samples of exotic spirits and dive into Pho's tasty $2 Dim Sum menu while chatting it up and swaying to exotic sounds. The Monday May12, 2008 event is free to the public from 5:30 PM- 7:30 PM but You must RSVP to www.thesecondglass.com Go to this event and click on it and there is a place to click to RSVP.

Note: Again you must RSVP at http://www.thesecondg..., not just here on the meet up site. You can also go there for more info about this event.

Free to Public, free samplings & Cash Bar, $2 Dim Sum

We will hang around longer to chat and practice our chinese. If you will be late that is fine. Just try to come before 7:30pm for the free wine and sake tasting.



Adele

---
------------
item.how_to_find_us: I will have someone hold a meet up sign to find us. I will also be late. I may not get there till 6:00Pm ish.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Pho Republique Hosts Wine & sake Sampling Event with Second Glass
